abstract.text: Structure containing the methods related to the user’s library.

inlineContent.text: provides comprehensive access to a user’s Apple Music library,
including methods to fetch, search, and manage library content.

code: let searchResults = try await MLibrary.search(for: "coldplay", types: [Song.self])
try await MLibrary.addPlaylist(name: "My Playlist", description: "My favorite songs")
